General & Misc. Astronomy

General astronomy (including some resources for lower level courses) and miscellaneous materials.

Textbooks

  • OpenStax Astronomy textbook (first edition here)
  • Handbook of Space Astronomy and Astrophysics by Martin V. Zombeck

Recorded Talk Series

  • AAS Journal Author Series
  • Caltech Astro Seminars and public talks
  • CfA Colloquium
  • Cork Astronomy Club
  • Texas A&M Physics & Astronomy Talks

Other Resources

  • Stellarium, “a free open source planetarium for your computer”
  • Astronomy Picture of the Day
  • Legacy Survey viewer
  • Firefly, an interactive web-based particle viewer by Aaron Geller and Alex Gurvich
